name: Escape Sequence (Sid Fish Games)
description:
Use your puzzle skills to help the player escape the dungeon. You will need to rely on controlling pawns that can move blocks that you can't directly.

Jam Theme: Forward Motion
GameMaker Sequences used for player movement, menu effects and room transitions.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
U key to undo move
R key to restart level
ESC to return to menu

Credits:
Concept, Coding and Art by Tony M from Sid Fish Games
